amendment.description: Amendment increases BIA funding for dirt school bus routes by $1.5 million and decreases the EPA's Environment Programs & Management fund by $1.75 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chaffetz amendment (A093) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Chaffetz amendment (A093) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A093) offered by Mr. Chaffetz.
